title: Rate of inflation in Belgium 2018 to 2020
summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Year on year percentage change in each Month on the y axis.
Month Nov '18 has the highest Year on year percentage change and Nov '19 has the lowest Year on year percentage change.
The highest Month Nov '18 has 2.39 more Year on year percentage change than the lowest Month Nov '19.
min_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Year on year percentage change in each Month on the y axis.
The Year on year percentage change is highest at Month Nov '18 and lowest at Month Nov '19.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Year on year percentage change in each Month on the y axis.
Month Nov '18 has the highest Year on year percentage change and Nov '19 has the lowest Year on year percentage change.
The highest Month Nov '18 has 2.39 more Year on year percentage change than the lowest Month Nov '19.
max_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Year on year percentage change in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Year on year percentage change 2.78 is found at Month Nov '18 and the minimum is found at Nov '19 where Month is 0.39.
The second highest Year on year percentage change is appeared to be the Month Oct '18.
The Year on year percentage change of Month Nov '18 is 7.13% larger than the minimum value at Nov '19.
Year on year percentage change at Month Nov '18 is 2.78 , second place is Oct '18 at 2.75, and thirdly is Sep '18 at 2.35.
The Year on year percentage change has risen over the past 25 Months.
Month Apr '19, and Jun '18 have a similar Year on year percentage change that is 2.08.
The Month Nov '18 tends to be 1.6 percent higher than average.
The Year on year percentage change is 43.34 if we add up values of all Months.
